DOC.brief_summary: Cyclosporine key drug organ transplantation . In Iran investigator 2500 new renal transplantation year government pay huge amount money subside import cyclosporine form Neoral . Recently Iranian drug company introduce drug name Iminoral approve different authority Iran abroad , ( include Ministry Health Iran also European Directorate Quality Medicines Certification Unit FDA ( Department Health Human Services , Center Drug Evaluation Research ) ) . The investigator study first clinical trial compare effect Iminoral versus Neoral prevent acute rejection renal transplantation also compare side effect two drug .
DOC.brief_title: Comparisone Iminoral Versus Neoral Prevention Acute Rejection Renal Transplantation
DOC.criteria: 1. renal transplantation candidate 2. write consent 3. take participate clinical trial last 3 month 1. primary FSGS 2. hyperoxaluria 3. age 18 4. multi organ transplantation 5. malignancy 5 year 6 . PRA > 25 % 7. use Tacrolimus 8. hyper acute rejection
